output_list.criticism: The transfer function does not check if the transfer amount exceeds the maximum uint256 value. If the transfer amount is greater than the maximum value, it will result in an integer overflow.
The _transfer function does not check if the transfer amount exceeds the maximum uint256 value. If the transfer amount is greater than the maximum value, it will result in an integer overflow.
The transferFrom function does not check if the transfer amount exceeds the maximum uint256 value. If the transfer amount is greater than the maximum value, it will result in an integer overflow.
The mint function does not check if the mint amount exceeds the maximum uint256 value. If the mint amount is greater than the maximum value, it will result in an integer overflow.
The _mint function does not check if the mint amount exceeds the maximum uint256 value. If the mint amount is greater than the maximum value, it will result in an integer overflow.
